document_name: Wind Hybrid Power Generation Market Development Initiatives (WHyPGen)

outputs.output_descr:
Component 1: WHyPGen Technology Application and Assessment:
a) Updated wind maps of Area with significant wind energy potentials
b) Techno-economic feasibility studies(FS) of potential WHyPGen application projects
c) Completed feasibility assessments of the local manufacturing/production of WHyPGen system components

• Component 2: WHyPGen Technology Demonstration
a) Successfully implemented WHyPGen pilots/demos
b) WHyPGen project replications planned and implemented

• Component 3: Financing WHyPGen Initiatives
a) Completed training and promotions for banking/financing institutions in financing WHyPGen projects
b) Designed financing schemes for WHyPGen projects 

• Component 4: Policy and Institutional Support for WHyPGen Initiatives
a) Completed policy study on WHyPGen system
b) Proposed policy frameworks supportive of wind energy (including WHyPGen) projects

• Component 5: WHyPGen Promotion
a) Designed and implemented WHyPGen promotion and advocacy program

• Component 6: WHyPGen Market Development and Industry Support
a) Completed capacity building and technical support program for the: (a) Local manufacturing of WHyPGen system components; (b) Design and engineering of WHyPGen projects; and, (c) Installation, operation and maintenance of WHyPGen facilities

project_descr: Wind Hybrid Power Generation (WHyPGen) Market Development Initiative (Full Size Project)
project_title: Wind Hybrid Power Generation (WHyPGen) Market Dev
